snippet.title: NES Longplay [922] City Adventure Touch: Mystery of Triangle
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Reinc

City Adventure Touch: Mystery of Triangle is an action-adventure game for the Famicom that was published by Toho in 1987. The game is based on manga Touch. City Adventure Touch is somewhat notorious in Japan for bearing absolutely no resemblance to the source material. A comic book concerning the Mystery of Triangle is included in the manual. The story appears to revolve around a character's dog who disappears into an alternate dimension, and the three children who attempt to rescue it.

This entire game is one big puzzle, and there is no way to beat it without a walkthrough. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
